name: Overture (itch) (annie, faultey, QueueFlash)
description:
This is team Hangry Byte's submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Theme: Out of Control.

What do you do when you're stuck in an arena only equipped with a gun and enemies are coming at you from all angles, but you have no control over when your gun fires? 

Don't take time to think about it,  just jump in and find out!
